title: Our Town!
detail_text: <:th_ch0211/>Our time has finally come!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>After Aqours and μ’s own local collaborations, Nijigasaki is also collaborating with Odaiba~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Yay!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Yay!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Both of you, be careful. It’s dangerous to walk when you’re not paying attention.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>That’s right. Plus, if you’re distracted, you’ll miss the pop-up stores and posters!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>You’re right! That’s a no-no!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>We should capture everything on video!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Leave the photography to me!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>I wonder if we can see everything in one day.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Don’t worry! The collaboration will be going on for a while, so we’ll be able to enjoy it as much as we want~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
